description: HotplugVolumeSource Represents the source of a volume to mount which are capable of being hotplugged on a live running VMI. Only one of its members may be specified.

hotpluggable.description: Hotpluggable indicates whether the volume can be hotplugged and hotunplugged.

name.description: Name of both the DataVolume and the PVC in the same namespace.

persistentVolumeClaim.description: PersistentVolumeClaimVolumeSource represents a reference to a PersistentVolumeClaim in the same namespace. Directly attached to the vmi via qemu. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes#persistentvolumeclaims

claimName.description: claimName is the name of a PersistentVolumeClaim in the same namespace as the pod using this volume. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/storage/persistent-volumes#persistentvolumeclaims

hotpluggable.description: Hotpluggable indicates whether the volume can be hotplugged and hotunplugged.

readOnly.description: readOnly Will force the ReadOnly setting in VolumeMounts. Default false.
